title: Branch change
content: Hey I got 8.14. As my cgpa I wanted to ask suppose I apply for aiml and cse and all as my choices and if I don't want to take that seat at that point can I reject it or you need to take if you apply?

comments.body: If you apply and get it, you need to take it. Why would you apply for a branch without the intention of switching branches?
Bro cos I'm in ece rr , suppose I want aiml or cse rr but thereare 3options so I would have to fill cse ec but I don't want cse ec so what to do
Why is the campus more important to you than the branch?
I swear if the "personal reason" happens to be because of some crush ðŸ˜­
Bro lol nah it's some other thing, anyways so you cannot cancel once you cannot reject once you fill for the seat?

I'm in cs-aiml(rr-campus)
Recently reading the suggestions from most of them here . I wish to change to cse (rr campus)
So can I just select 1 preference as cs(rr campus)
and leave other 2 options blank
